page.title: 12AUSTERFIELD GOLF CLUB (2)
page.content: One third of the clubs members who answered our questionaire thought the{fees}were reasonable while the rest thought them{too high.}Only one third of the golfers said that the facilities were alright,others did not think much of them.Amongst the things that people wanted to{change}or add were the{course layout}and overwhelmingly came the plea for {better changing rooms.}A few members said that they were distracted by the R.A.F. planes but on the whole most didn't mind them.The most popular time for playing was early in the morning. The average time for one round is about 4 hours but this varies.
